sites.name: 1337 Universe
sites.description: Bold typographic landing page with neon cyan/magenta/green accents and l33t speak navigation. Features massive hero text about a universe 'born from the big spark'.

sites.name: Revitin
sites.description: Clean prebiotic toothpaste e-commerce page with soft pastel circles, cream background, and elegant serif typography. Minimal, health-focused aesthetic.

sites.name: Swehl
sites.description: Warm peach-toned e-commerce landing with bold serif headlines, 'Products Made For This Century' tagline, and dual CTA buttons. Features NYT press mention banner.

sites.name: DAEDALUS
sites.description: Dark cinematic landing page for a comic/game project with dramatic red gradient background, stark white logo, and social media integration. Comic book aesthetic.

sites.name: Every Layout
sites.description: Educational CSS book landing page with clean black/white design, book cover preview, pricing section, and email capture. Developer-focused with clear hierarchy.

sites.name: Build Collective
sites.description: Elegant investment/venture studio page with large serif 'Making things worth making' headline. Clean white background with mission-driven messaging.

sites.name: Browserbase
sites.description: AI browser infrastructure SaaS landing with colorful app icons (red/yellow/blue), clean white design, VC logos (a16z, Y Combinator), and clear value proposition.

sites.name: Anterior
sites.description: Healthcare AI platform with cream background, large serif headlines, and striking purple-to-blue gradient hero image. Enterprise-focused with waitlist CTA.

sites.name: Healthcare Landing
sites.description: Professional healthcare template with sage green accents, 'Life-changing care' headline, 24/7 availability stats, and appointment booking interface.

sites.name: Stardock WindowBlinds
sites.description: Authentic late-2000s software product page with dark blue-gray theme, sidebar navigation, product screenshots, and $19.95 pricing. Nostalgic Web 2.0 design.

sites.name: Daisy AI
sites.description: Playful AI creative tool landing with pastel sticky-note cards, scrapbook aesthetic, and 'Give your ideas a glow up' headline. Whimsical, approachable design.

sites.name: Hyperplex
sites.description: Dark DeFi/liquidity platform with gold 'HYPERACTIVE LIQUIDITY' headline, TVL stats ($12.4M), yield metrics (+127%), and sleek fintech dashboard aesthetic.

sites.name: Making Software
sites.description: Technical ebook landing with blueprint-style diagrams, serif 'MAKING SOFTWARE' header, and educational content about how computers work. Clean, informative layout.

sites.name: Monaverse
sites.description: Metaverse gallery platform with pink 'MONA' branding, space/earth imagery, and 'Explore new worlds' tagline. Features world showcases like 'MSS Pandora'.

sites.name: The Cool Club
sites.description: Playful card game e-commerce with soft pink background, mint product cards, 'Hello Handsome' greeting, and category filters (Cars, Animals, Humans).

sites.name: Mainframe
sites.description: Developer manifesto page with monospace typography, terminal-style login timestamp, and poetic 'CD, RM, PING: commands we memorized' messaging. Minimalist hacker aesthetic.

sites.name: Fishwife
sites.description: Vibrant yellow tinned seafood e-commerce with floating product tins (Mussels varieties), green navigation bar, and 'Just Dropped' new arrival callout.

sites.name: Agency Book
sites.description: Book landing page with rich green background, tree-root cover illustration, 'The Antidote to a Culture Obsessed with Self' subtitle. Publishing/author focused.

sites.name: PlanetScale (Teal)
sites.description: Dark database SaaS landing with teal/cyan accents, 'world's fastest database' headline, feature pills (Performance, Security, Uptime), and enterprise trust signals.

sites.name: PlanetScale (Orange)
sites.description: Dark database SaaS variant with orange accents, same 'fastest database' messaging, and enterprise client logos (Block, Etsy, Slack, Gusto). Bold CTA buttons.
